website_summaries.verdict: A state-of-the-art multi cooker that can do the work of numerous other small appliances and has the capacity to cook for large groups.
pros: Has a generous 8-quart capacity that's perfect for families
Ninja's proprietary TenderCrip technology gives food a light, crispy texture while locking in juices
Even functions as an air fryer
cons: Takes up a bit of storage or counter space
Some customers report faulty models with functions that stopped working within a few months or weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for the “as advertised “ a simple way to cook food and veggies. Followed the short rib recipe in their cookbook to the “T” down to the second. Ribs were like rubber and the veggies were under cooked. The manual is cumbersome as well. Don’t waste your money on this product. Going to return this item. Very hyped with poor results.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Make sure all material to clean are with product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, but the one tray for crisper is kinda hard to clean, the lower removable plastic piece does not clean easy, also the top part for Crisper you need a special star screw driver star tip in in order to clean it, this should be provide with the product
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: EXPENSIVE PIECE of JUNK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy!!! Good concept. Problems from the start lid error!!!!!! Tooooo expensive to be having these problems. Can only use the airfryer. No pressure etc.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K

customer_reviews.title: Disgustingly used unit
customer_reviews.text: This item came to me scratched and used. How do I know, it had caked on food. Disgusting
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I received my Ninja Foodie in March. I used it 3 times in the past month and was quite pleased with it. I plugged it in yesterday and there was a spark at the base of the Ninja and that was it! It has just stopped working after only one month and 3 uses.... I should have just bought an Instapot at 1/4th the price. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: INDRAKSHI SEN

customer_reviews.title: Do your research to get cookin
customer_reviews.text: I like you can cook so many things with one gadget, but most other people in the home found it too complicated. You do have to do research on how to cook each item before starting. I made Cuban black beans and beef stew using both the pressure and slow cooker. Both came out well. I would suggest buying the model that comes with the reversible or deluxe basket because you really need it and it's expensive separately.
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Used it once a week and in two months the pressure button does not work. Will send another foodi but I have to pay return shipping of $24.95. It’s not the customer fault that it’s defective.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Brown

customer_reviews.title: quit working 33 days after delivery  I called and they refused to replace used twice
customer_reviews.text: wouldnt buy this if I were you total waste of 200 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Curtis V.

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I received my product today And it was an international shipping. I plugged in the appliance and after 5 seconds, it sparked and the product is dead now. I have no idea how to return this product if i want to return, i will have to pay high shipping costs. I am very disappointed as the product which i received was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Mujahid

customer_reviews.title: Best thing in my kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Broke it in with steak and roasted Brussels sprouts and had the best meal. Have made chicken, pork loin, meatloaf, bacon, eggs, burgers in it. I am terrible at cooking and hate cleaning up. We haven't been to chipotle since we bought this. Get the 8 quart.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: product arrived with none of the accessories that it was supposed to have.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product for my fiance who has been wanting one for some time. The package arrived all banged up and ripped on both sides of the box. It was supposed to come with a couple different baskets for cooking, a wire rack and some sort of cookbook, All the box had in it was the unit and a pressure lid. How is one supposed to use this with no instructions or the pieces needed to use it? Very disappointed especially with a $200 price tag. Lets see how the replacement being sent turns out, hope It doesn't need to be sent back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Unbelieveable
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice, what rave reviews. I am sure there is a learning curve, but I am sure it will be easy to learn. Expensive, but you are in total control of what you are cooking..... Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Booboo

customer_reviews.title: Need to return for refund
customer_reviews.text: The item is larger than expected. To big for kitchen counter, not enough space to store. Need to return for refund
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Keller

customer_reviews.title: Big learning curve
customer_reviews.text: So far we've done 4 recipes in the foodi. I honestly don't think i would buy this again. It's not to blame the foodi itself however I'm having a hard time learning how to use it. Chicken comes out raw even using their guide lines, when making their mac and cheese we had vomit looking goop come out when venting.... And no it wasnt even near the fill line.
customer_reviews.author: Jmadden

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, but as I said. It wasn’t functioning properly
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in, was literally beat like a piñata. Oh and it didn’t work when I plugged it in. Looks like it was returned, and they passed it right on to me.
customer_reviews.author: 13rish

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Donot waste your money as its so heavy to carry. The weight of the product is to much. The attached lid of air fryer or crisp feature is way to tough to clean. Because we cannot detached the lids. Go with a cheap air fryer or pressure cooker/ instant pot.
customer_reviews.author: Capricorn 1101

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product mostly for the pressure cooker. Of course it doesn’t hold pressure and I called the company about the problem. They said they would send another pressure top because the one I have is defective. So I bought the product in April they and arent sending me a new top until June 19 because supposedly they’re on backorder. Its been sitting in my kitchen for two months now and a total of three months by the time I get it. Do yourself a favor and just buy an Insta pot and or an airfryer. This, to me, is an overpriced gimmick and not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant Quality Food from your Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: "NINJA FOODI ROCKS!" My husband loves this appliance. Now he has fresh crispy chicken and he doesn't have to leave home! We use it every day. If you're considering air fryer or instapot, get both and more with the Ninja Foodi.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Not a magic cooking machine
customer_reviews.text: Been using this item for a couple of weeks Like: Versatile, pressure cook then air fry Dislike: Takes huge counter space. Missing silicone guard for inner pressure vent, cooking instructions not as complete as I wanted ( i.e. after pressure cooking no mention that one must empty the boiling water in the equally hot outer pot), small space for air frying (2 chicken pcs thigh with drumstick), pressure leaky (having some steam escape while cooking) after a weeks use. Overall, its an ok product, not the magic cooking device I had expected. I will keep experimenting.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander T.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic appliance. I love the versatility and look forward to many meals made with this!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maxfield

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Although I bought this about 6 months ago, I used about 3 times and got busy and have Not used it months. Today attempted to pressure then Crisp a whole chicken. It kept saying to SHUT lid. After 45 min I put the chicken in my regular oven. I unplugged and re-plugged the light kept saying SHUT, I guess I will throw it away soon. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Sue R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.text: French fries were just OK-fried twice even was not the best. I watched a video on cooking a whole chicken. I cooked for over an hour and STILL had to put it in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the foodi !!!
customer_reviews.text: Have cooked alot in the foodi so far and everything has come out FANTASTIC. It has also replaced other tools I had in my kitchen so I was able to declutter my kitchen a litte because of the foodis versatility. The one negative is that it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Trust me

customer_reviews.title: Ninji Foodi does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I love the chicken the best. Its so moist on the inside, but the skin goes crisp and golden brown. Turns out like a restaurant. just brushed with oil. like the pressure cooker on it also. husband loves gizzards and noodles and cooks that in the pressure cooker. next to try is cabbage and ham - tradition to make on new years day for his 3 boys to come home to eat. I think it cures hangovers maybe???? waiting for 2 new cookbooks to arrive to try different things.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Lippert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Life changing! My wife has missed sinner by hours every time she tried cooking a roast or a crockpot meal not anymore and the air fryer is epic!
customer_reviews.author: C Sonnenberg

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to a grandchild. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elinor Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Owned less then 4 months. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this product less then 4 months and can't use the pressure cooker function, which is the only reason I bought it. I'm a big fan of Ninja products but this is such a disappointment. The amount of money spent on this to only have it break after a few tes of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Foodi 1400 Pressure cooker, Steamer & Air Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed trying the Ninja Foodi. My husband and I took turns cooking in it and following foodi Cook book recipes. Some of the resceps like the mac and cheese was horrible. If you cook in the foodi you must follow the recipes in the book only. It is very time consuming and takes up so much room in the kitchen and I have lots of counter space it still looks like Darth Vader on top of the counter. Yes its easy to just though everything in it, but not when you have to follow it by the cookbook, or it doesn't come out right. Barb.
customer_reviews.author: barbarabrickell

customer_reviews.title: Wife is not happy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a present. My wife has used the pressure cooker, & on the 4th time, the message shows LID. She checked the lid & the sealing ring. All was clean. We are ready to get our money back. This should be an item that lasts & lasts for what we paid for it. Order new sealing ring from Ninja and still get message "Lid" Piece of JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Foodie replacement Gaskets not available until March!
customer_reviews.text: Basically like this product; however the silicon ring retains food odors. Ours smells like cauliflower, fish, and french onion soup. We have tried to purchase replacements, but was just told by the Ninja customer service representative they are back ordered, not available until March??? Just crazy. Guess we can't do any desserts, etc., until we can get replacement rings, due to the odor transferring to the food. Poor planning, Ninja!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Inside pot sticks to the lid. So when you remove the top you are also unintentionally pulling a very hot pot full of food towards yourself, but the put falls away from the lid, and that's where the scalding starts.
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING ELSE SITS IN THE BACKGROUND!!!!
customer_reviews.text: First my husband and I are both blind. Using braille high dots we marked and made a chart of each function. We can even control time and temperature. My husband has for all intense and purposes band use of anything else he loves it so much!!!!!!!!! It works perfectly for our limited counter space. We'll take it outside on the patio on hot days during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: The best multi purpose cooker available!!
customer_reviews.text: Best cooking appliance in my kitchen, I definitely use my foodi everyday!!
customer_reviews.author: Chima Kanu

customer_reviews.title: Hurry Up and Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a paid promotion. I am not paid to write reviews, in fact I rarely if ever write reviews, but this device compelled me to pick up my iPad and share this goodness with the world. This appliance is absolutely unequivocally hands down a must have for every kitchen. It’s fast, it’s versatile, the food is delicious and the cleanup is a breeze. We have had everything from potatoes to pork steak and just about everything you can think of in between....pot roasts, lamb, quail, chicken, pork chops and the list goes on and on.... If you don’t have it, stop thinking, stop researching ...go get it.
customer_reviews.author: natasha smith

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the money if your buying this for the air fryer function. I've done wings a few times and not even close to crispy. My 1/2 the price air fryer does the job in half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Watch the item on tv didn't say you had to purchase other items for bbq
customer_reviews.author: Cobber

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the weight of the Ninja....I was so excited to get it but quickly realized it was tooo heavy for me to lift in and out of the cabinet. I was very disappointed. Now it is back to the Ins Pot.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl English

customer_reviews.title: Does not make fried potatoes or french fries
customer_reviews.text: It was not what it represented. I try to make fries and I came out like steamed vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Almost five stars, but the lid is annoying to align.
customer_reviews.text: It's big and heavy but that's not a big deal. Easy to use. A breeze to clean. Cooks great. The air fryer is really nice. I would rather have this than a separate air fryer. The pan is perfectly nonstick. My only problem with it is that the pressure lid is not easy to put on. It's hard to align. I would really give it a 4.5. Having the air fryer offsets the lid problem. Almost
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Purchase EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice and then broken. Ninja customer service phone number does not work. Found another phone number and after bing transferred 3 times got disconnected. They wanted to charge me $20 for new machine. Amazon only giving me $175 back and I have to pay shipping. I am paying the shipping and getting rid of this heavy and huge useless machine. Feeling sad and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. The product is made of cheap material. When placing the pressure cooker lid the paint just peels off the front when the lid touches anything horrible purchase
customer_reviews.author: rameen

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I so love this pressurer cooker. I am still learning the In's and out of its capabilities, but over all I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Graves

customer_reviews.title: I love it except one thing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing appliance with one major flaw, imo. Unless your standing next to it watching it you will probably miss the beep indicating it’s done. This is mainly a big issue with pressure cooking. I have ruined hard boiled eggs and potatoes for potato salad on multiple occasions because this thing it so quiet when it beeps, especially if your in the next room over. They need to either make it louder or continuous, like a microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great for full meal. Not a time saver
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this would be a good product for someone that doesn’t have a stove and oven but the meals take just as long to make and feeding a family is impossible with the size. If you just want to use it for a part of the meal (chicken, or fries) then I am sure it works great but the full meal recipes don’t fit. The rack is way to close to the top to be able to close once all the food is added to the rack. I am going to return the product and replace it with just an air frier with more room and use the stove and oven for the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Waters

customer_reviews.title: Air fry lid attached not practical
customer_reviews.text: This would be so much better if the airfry lid was attached at the back. Most kitchens lack counter space as it is. The cord was so short, it just about fell off the counter, so once something was done, the unit was to heavy to move and the food was difficult to remove because the airfry lid does not detach.
customer_reviews.author: Natures Retreat

customer_reviews.title: bad design on the crisper lid
customer_reviews.text: crispr lid is VERY HARD to clean. if you need to buy a specific tool to clean and break your warranty at the same time, then that shouldn’t even pass testing nor that shouldn’t happen. I should be able to detach that part that needs cleaning and either be able to wash by hand, place it in the dishwasher or use a damp towel. you can’t even detach it, which looks pretty obnoxious when using the other lid. gonna be my last time buying anything from ninja. If only i could put negative stars
customer_reviews.author: Amado

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I’ve made a few dinners on it and my family loves the way the food taste
customer_reviews.author: Pedro R.

customer_reviews.title: First Impression and Use
customer_reviews.text: I just made my first attempt at doing the combo, pressure cooking then 'Tender-Crisping, and it turned out pretty amazing. First I took apple slices and layered them in the bottom with some water to make steam, and then seasoned a Blade steak and laid it on top. I pressure cooked it 15 minutes, then air crisped it for 10. The meat literally cuts with a fork, yet has a nice crisp from being air fried and has a nice pork+apple flavor, and I get a nice dessert :) All in all I'd say it works exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kuenster

customer_reviews.title: Okay for certain meals
customer_reviews.text: The Foodi is excellent quality. I struggle a bit with the pressure lid but I'm short so I'm crediting some of the difficulty to that. I love meat that is pressure cooked. The "crisping" aspect is not at 100% though it is definitely better than none at all. I have been following existing recipes to a T. I feel like once I have the time to truly experiment with timing, seasonings, etc., I will grow to love this machine. This is not a machine I would recommend for kids or even young teenager use. The pressure is very high and the pressure release is scary and could burn someone not being careful.
customer_reviews.author: SusanER

customer_reviews.title: i  love it and know i am gooing for extra now
customer_reviews.text: I love it . I just wish I know that parts well fix in side to do more thing like rack and some other thing I had brought the wrong one for mine ninja they where to small do u know that rack and extra will fix I would realy be helpful thank u
customer_reviews.author: P. Farnsworth

customer_reviews.title: How easy the Ninja Foodi is to use
customer_reviews.text: Liked how quick (15 minutes) it cooked a 4.6 lb. chicken and browned it in another 15 minutes! But most of all, it was the most moist and delicious chicken I have ever eaten!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: multi-use product
customer_reviews.text: I have them all-steamer/ dehydrator/slow cooker/ pressure cooker/ air and oil fryers- but they're all being donated to GoodWill- this product does it all. Use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: ron isbell

customer_reviews.title: great air fryer as well as pressure cooker
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish is that it was bigger. It is easy to use and clean. The settings seem easy to use with a little reading I was able to use all the features. I am still learning how long it takes to cook things so I stick to the recipes pretty much but I plan on making ribs this weekend and it really is way faster than on the grill or slow cooker.
customer_reviews.author: monica f bull

customer_reviews.title: Too huge!
customer_reviews.text: This pot is very large so make sure you measure it first. I wish I had bought the 6 qt instead as it doesn’t fit in my cabinet. Too large to leave out. I ended up putting it in the box (never used it) and stuck it in the basement. I wish I can send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Z

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE the Foodi!! 1 star for Shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The Foodi is absolutely amazing and we love it so far...... However, the shipping company was less than stellar. It arrived broken. The back plastic panel above the condensation collector was cracked in half and just broke off. Also the crisping lid is super loud and I feel like it's from getting slammed around during shipping. I will be doing research to see if the sound is normal, but may have to exchange for another one which will be a pain in the butt!
customer_reviews.author: LaTasha Nuzum

customer_reviews.title: Great Device. Lousy Recipes
customer_reviews.text: This device is easy to use and works well. Cleanup (other than the wire lift up tray) is easy. The booklet of recipes so far has been less than stellar. The stuffed peppers were horrible and I love stuffed peppers. The chicken pot pie needs work. The herb chicken fell short. Be prepared to adapt your own recipes if you want good food.
customer_reviews.author: Starstruck

customer_reviews.title: Stupid. Crisping. Lid.
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this so much. I really do. I love all of my other ninja products. The fact that the crisping lid isn’t detachable is the only thing making my review so low. I wish it had like a little button so you could easily take it off if you weren’t planning on using it. Other than that. It out performs my instant pot every time.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Tee

customer_reviews.title: Really like this thing other than the two Lids.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little nervous but super easy to use. Bigger than expected and has two lids but only one comes off. The two lid system is really the only thing I don’t really like. I understand since both have separate functions but not easy for storage or using in a kitchen space with cabinets above. Or aesthetics to see a lid standing straight up when using the other lid. But it cooks fast and the user guide me are super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine! Recipe book instructions burn your food
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love how quick and yummy meals come out. I bought it for my husband as he loves cooking for us. I gave 3 stars for easy to use because following exact recipe directions, food still burned and recipes don't give realistic time frame from prep to table. There are release and rest times that the total time given in recipe don't account for. It will be a learning curve using it but we do love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalynda

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you live in a country with different voltage!
customer_reviews.text: I really love cooking... and I was extremely excited with prospect of expanding and experimenting with new tools for cooking. After extensive research I landed on ninja foodi and spent 600 usd to have it delivered. This review is for firstly for Seller or Distributor, please do not make possible for item to be sold anywhere where voltage is not same as in USA.. even with appropriate electric adapter, air crisp lid gave smoke upon turning on, and fan burned. Really gutted....Amazon is place where products are internationally sold... if you don’t test your product, or limit its sale geography, you are really causing damage to your potential and actual clients...
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this product. I received it today and immediately washed it and tried it out. I made buffalo wings using the air fryer feature. So easy. I did not do them from frozen, but it’s good to know that I can. Don’t have a photo for you because I gobbled them up. I can tell you that they were crispy on the outside and moist on the inside. Delicious!!!! I can’t wait to try other recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start off saying I have been wanting a Foodi almost since it was first introduced but was difficult with my budget. When Amazon offered at an affordable price I immediately jumped. It is everything it has been written about and maybe more. There is a slight learning curve but once mastered, it is easy to use. I have to admit, I have only used the pressure cooker and air fryer function and what I made from a chicken chili to sausage and peppers to wings and chicken drumsticks have come out fantastic. And thanks to Amazon with Kindle Unlimited so many helpful cookbooks are offered. If this fits our budget, don't hesitate .
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure cookers and crispers. Pretty easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Have only cooked a few meals but the Foodi did a great job. I’ve never used a pressure cooker before but Its my new favorite. My only complaint is the Foodi is bigger and heavier than I expected and can’t be used on a counter if there are cabinets overhead so I didn’t save any space.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Boylan

customer_reviews.title: Not functioning anymore
customer_reviews.text: I've used it twice, now on my third attempt I'm getting a shut lid error when I try to use the fryer. The lid is shut and the unit will not work. Its a brand new unit. I am not happy with this product..
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pitkin

customer_reviews.title: Alittle disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So when my ninja foodi arrived the lid was broken. Then I used it one time and all the paint chipped off the inner bowl . Under neath the chipped paint all the metal was rusted. I'm not satisfied at all. Very disappointed. I called the MANUFACTURE to see about getting a new foodi base . They wanted me to pay another 25.00 for the shipping of a new base . The foodi I had wasnt even a day old why should I be paying for a replacement I should have recieved a new unit to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRESSURE COOKER
customer_reviews.text: I made one of the recipes that was included with the pressure cooker and wow, it was so easy and effortless to cook restaurant quality meals its unbelivable. The crisper option is a genious feature and it makes the food look perfect. I would highly recommend this product if you just want to start cooking or eating healthy. Grocery shopping and making your own food saves a lot more money in the long run!! I was deciding which pressure cooker to get and I do not regret buying Ninja Foodi... it works great and I am gonna be using it for a long time. The only downside is the size of this thing but, its allllll good.
customer_reviews.author: Kimulus

customer_reviews.title: Love the versatility!
customer_reviews.text: I'm still figuring out the best recipes, but so far we have really loved our Foodi. It's awesome having one unit that can Air Fry and Pressure Cook. I literally use it almost ever day, whether it's to reheat something real quick, or make a side dish or a full meal, it's a super work horse. The Air Fryer is the best for reheating a slice of pizza or a sandwich. I just used the pressure cooker to make rice yesterday and it worked perfectly. It is big, but I'd rather have one big unit, than have to have a separate air fryer and pressure cooker.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A BEAST
customer_reviews.text: I returned another air fryer by yedi since it started rusting. I bought this one instead. This monster is unbelievable . It does everything. Easy to handle . It pressure cooks, steams, bakes, Boils, and air frys it., and dehydrate fruits. I guess I will never use my stove or oven again. I recommend 8 quart since you can really use it for all dishes. Cookbook is included. The instructions are easy. Anyone who likes to eat healthy food , spend a little more and get this. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Nikolay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust Amazon without a lot of reference work
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed I bought a product that was promised to be renewed to be just like no. What I got was a dirty unit that had to be washed before I could even be thought about looking at really because it still had food in it and it had broken parts and missing parts. And I spent almost full price for it. This was a waste of money big-time
customer_reviews.author: justraveln

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one pressure cooker and air fryer
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6qt instant pot ultra and used it a lot for quick dishes that would normally take forever. Ever since I got this, the ultra and the air fryer have been in storage. Have made plenty of soups and dishes and this Ninja has been flawless every time. Might take the ultra out of storage for some dishes as this 8qt is a bit big for every day cooking... Overall a great device that saves time and hassle with its dual purpose design. Got it on one of Amazon's great deals on this unit and haven't been happier.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Ninja meltdown...
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this product... Received this as a Christmas gift. I have used it for about a month with no problems. I’ve made sure to cook everything as directed in booklet. Just put dinner on using the pressure cook option and it started smoking after warming up. Thankfully it turned itself off. Very upset since I’ve already passed up the return date of January 31st. Definitely concerning considering I left it running at home numerous times on the slow cook option. I’m so glad I was home tonight!! Users beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: How is a product used without directions ????!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with no owners manual or recipe books as described and written on the box ! Worthless no matter what the price......
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Bay Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: Overwhelming at first. When it says 2 minutes, just push 2. Not 2:00 or you’ll get 2 hours. Learning as you go. A lot of buttons. I’m sure it will get easier the more you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in product- Do not waste your money another expensive gadget you do not need.
customer_reviews.text: I have followed the directions for each recipe and have tried numerous recipes ( from your beginners book) and all of them have been a failure. They either were overcooked or undercooked and the, meats did not brown like they stated would happen. The reason I purchased the foodi is because I have diet restrictions unable to eat fatty foods due to being a cancer survivor. Do not waste your money on this product it is much easier to cook meals without the foodi and the food tastes much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: The Kitchen Appliance You Really Do Need
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my Ninja Foodi purchase! We've been electric pressure cooker users for many years but had not purchased an air fryer because I just didn't want another small appliance in my kitchen. My old electric pressure cooker has been having trouble getting up to pressure so I knew it was about time to replace it and along came the Ninja Foodi as an Amazon Deal of the Day. I'm so glad I jumped on it and purchased! We have used this appliance almost EVERY day since it arrived!! We've done everything from popcorn shrimp and air fried pickles to savory panko encrusted chicken! This appliance does it all!
customer_reviews.author: Smileychele

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE & TREAT YO'SELF
customer_reviews.text: We love this !! After using our power cooker to make soups all the time, it got a perminant onion & garlic taste, even after streaming it with vinegar. So that led us to the foodie. It's non stick, smooth pot is a blessing. Easy to clean. No texture to scrub. Being able to steam, air fry, keep warm, can, brown, dehydrate, pressure cook and I'm sure I'm forgetting the other features, is so cool. My husband made a cheesecake in it the other day, (and it didn't taste like onion or garlic, he's welcome) which came out perfectly! Love it. Splurge. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: WENT OUT AFTER 4 MONTHS OF USE
customer_reviews.text: So I really fell in love with this product when I first got it. It was amazing. Even though I didn't get the version I ordered, I settled for it. Well its now April and the thing just cut out completely. Doesn't come on it nothing. Tried to contact customer service 5x and every time I get put on hold the phone hangs up. I'd really like if someone could help me see if I could fix it so I won't have to get another one but this is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: EbonyCountry

customer_reviews.title: Multiple appliances in one!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! We were debating getting an instant pot and air fryer separately. There is no need for that now. Blown away by how many different things you can do in this. It is a big appliance but it takes the place of 5 appliances so worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS BROKE SECOND USE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I DONT THINK THAT THE NINJA IS POOR QUALITY I THINK AMAZON IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE DEFECTS BECAUSE OF HANDLING. IF YOU BUY ANYTHING FROM AMAZON SUCH AS THIS KEEP THE BOX BECAUSE YOU MAY HAVE A BAD ITEM AND HAVE TO RETURN IT
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Damon

customer_reviews.title: Great machine to have and use
customer_reviews.text: We recently started a better way of eating as a family, better ingredients, better serving sizes, but we are like most a very busy family, always on the go. So when you are short on time this really helps you eat better and quicker. All in one air fryer, instapot, steamer, rice cooker. slower cooker. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: momofdeuce

customer_reviews.title: Works great for home and catering.
customer_reviews.text: We have used this cooker/air fryer for just about everything in our house and small catering events - whole brisket, Bavarian Pretzels (baked fresh!) fried chicken, fries, shrimp; baked bread (Old German recipes!), cakes, stews, soups....! The Foodie is a snap to use and clean and is very compact when we travel with it. Keeps things simple. Temperatures and time are very accurate. As an aside: always reset your pressure lid seal (push it down all the way) before using. This will ensure your system will pressurize.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.F. Houpt II, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Ninja Foodi 301 Review
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this Foodi 301. Air crisper is a wonderful plus. My only negative is not with the machine, but the cheap material that the screws holding the handles on the Air Fry crisper basket are made from.. One broke off and the whole basket would have to be replaced by Ninja by returning it. Otherwise, I like the Foodi.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Too Much for Two people
customer_reviews.text: We thought this would be a nice idea and versatile with a lot of options. Received the box that was very heavy. The amount of parts in the box was overwhelming. My wife saw all the parts with the instruction Manual, seemed like a overkill for us. Also had no room to store this monster.. She stated to hyperventilate. We returned it to Amazon and ordered a simple air fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed with this machine. I have cooked chicken pot pie, both pork tenderloin and beef roast, air fried French fries, chicken nuggets and potatoes but what really sold me is the way it cooked Rib Eye steak. I probably wouldn’t have tried this but due to severe winter weather I wasn’t able to pull out the rectec grill. Perfectly cooked 2 steaks in 12 minutes using broil setting. Fat was rendered perfectly and the coloring and little bits of charred meat sealed the deal.
customer_reviews.author: joshua meyer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Ninja foodi
customer_reviews.text: I am exceptionally bad at cooking! I don't generally enjoy the process. But I'm a mom and a wife, so occasionally I'm expected to produce something edible in the kitchen. I discovered that I'm pretty good with kitchen appliances (like bread maker, jam maker, etc) With my new ninja foodi, i feel that I can make something pretty wonderful in the kitchen. I LOVE this machine . Its incredible easy to use, and food come out perfectly every time. I must say, I was very scared to use it at first, but now I love it. Best appliance ever!!! Dinner is so easy with this.
customer_reviews.author: HikingMom

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER A FEW USES
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a few uses. ERROR MESSAGE - ERR2. Tried to find a resolution online, but no info available. I’ve read that this happens to a lot of them. So mad. It’s acting like it’s refurbished which it was not listed as such when we bought ours. So now, we have to contact Ninja customer service to deal with it. We’ve taken very good care of it, and used as instructed on each meal. This should not give us an error message that you can’t even lookup. ERR2 - call customer service because your Foodi system is not working. Our item was sold by amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kan

customer_reviews.title: Good BUT it when opening the cover (as directed) when air crisping it vibrates
customer_reviews.text: I have to press down on the top to get it to stop making a annoying vibrating sound. It quiets down for a minute or so then starts the vibrating noise again. It is LARGE and if you live in a Condo or Apt check the space in front of your cabinets as it needs room to vent the hot air. It is HEAVY too and has rubber-like legs that you can't push over. You literally have to lift it and it weighs about 30 lbs. Otherwise I like it very much. I made the 5 lb chicken and it was very good. And I roast vegetables and they are quick and outstanding. God bless you.
customer_reviews.author: Luce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the person that cooks because they have to , Not want to
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this product . There is a learning curve for it and I have just started using it. Love that I could pressure cook a meat loaf and then brown it in the same container. I have been using a small Instapot , induction stove top and large toaster ovem. This product sort of combines all of that into one appliance on my counter. The cleanup is very easy also. I have viewed cooking as an occasional pain in butt, and did it rarely , eating stuff that while convenient , wasn't necessarily good or healthy. I have used this cooker 4 times in the last two weeks and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: It great
customer_reviews.text: I kind of impulse buy different kitchen gadgets and end up never using them a lot... this was the deal of the day awhile ago ... I bought it I thought this might end up the same way but nope. I use this everyday it's a better pressure cooker than my old one I don't necessarily pressure cook things everyday but the thing I do use almost every day is the airfryer. It's a really good way to roast/fry meats it's a really great way to cook various frozen foods... It's honestly probably my favorite purchase I made this entire year.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the BEST appliance I own
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Foodi every day since it arrived, sometimes more than once a day. It replaces so many of my small appliances that are clogging up my cupboards and overflowing into my garage. So far our favorite meals have been air fried chicken, lasagna, Mexican pizza bake and grilled cheese. It has a permanent home on my counter and I absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tired Mom

customer_reviews.title: This is the best kitchen appliance I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Foodi and use it daily. I've used every function except for the dehydrator and they all work great, including: putting an entire bag of french fries in to be airfryed at once; pressure cooked eggs, potatoes, chicken (for my dog), and even tamales, slow roasted beef, slow cooked ribs... If you wonder if you can do it in a Foodi, Google it and its already been done and has instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B.

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks!! Ripoff!!
customer_reviews.text: Lid came broken. Finally got the replacement pressure lid. Trying to get it to work and it just keeps saying to put the lid when it's already on. This thing sucks so bad I just want to beat the thing with a bat! Under cooked chicken not crispy... not at all happy feel I was ripped off!!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Biggest pros are *it is more versatile than an instapot *comes to pressure faster than an IP *works well in all of its settings *good size for a family *easy to use *easy to clean On the downside *the dual lids require extra storage space *internal stacking isn't as easy as I think it should be It has been a great addition to the kitchen. We use the airfrier most regularly, AF baked potatoes and bacon are great. Being able to pressure cook meat from frozen really saves the day when nothing is defrosted. Whole grain rice is so much easier in the pressure cooker too. Absolutely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ginni

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic - especially for cooking for two. I've done everything from crockpot cooking to grilling pork chops to roasting sweet potatoes to pressure cooking a whole chicken. I love this Ninja Foodi! I bought one for my daughter and she sold her Instapot to keep this and then bought a smaller one for my 85 year old mom - she's reading all of the recipes and is almost ready to use! Versatile and easy to clean. It's heavy so I keep it on my countertop but I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: D M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We initially could not figure out what size to get for our family of 3. We initially got the 6.5 Q which was way too big and bulky. We returned it then got the 4.0 Q which was about right but we wanted something that opens from the top. So we returned that one then settled on the 5.0Q which turned out to be perfect. I have made many things with it since purchasing it including fried plantains, BBQ chicken wings and frittata which both turned out great. It comes with a small cook book as well. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ukchard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far we are very pleased. We love that the basket is off the heated surface so we don't have to flip our food like we did in our old air fryer. I love the ability to just lift it up, peek in, and close it for it to start back automatically where it left off. The warming feature is what has sold me the most. It is also so easy to clean with just wiping it out or washing the basin. Can't wait to try more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: abizzybody

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item!
customer_reviews.text: What I got in the mail was the Ninja Air Fryer. Not the Cooker and air fryer in one. Just the air fryer. At least they are giving me my money back. But now I have to order it again! Second times the charm???
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Hight

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a joy to use. Excellent for making shedded meats. Quick meals are a breeze. Wish it came with more of the available options for ways of cooking. Be sure when cleaning to not use a scratch pad on the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Griffin

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Makes wonderful rotisserie chicken and soups. Bought this to replace our InstaPot solely for the crisper and it is one of the most used items in the kitchen now. Fries taste better, chicken is moist, soups are quick, mashed potatoes a breeze, the list goes on. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Dinner will never be the same again!
customer_reviews.text: I had been going back and forth between getting an air fryer and a pressure cooker. When I saw the Ninja Foodi 7-in-1 would do both, I had to get it! I have had it for a month now and don't know what I ever did before I had one. It is so easy to use (even though in the beginning I was quite intimidated by all the buttons, etc. I've used all the functions and have had no problems at all. Not only is it easy to use, but it is SO easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Sharilyn Dickerson

product_meta.title: Ninja Foodi 9-in-1 Pressure, Broil, Dehydrate, Slow Cooker, Air Fryer, and More, with 8 Quart Capacity and 45 Recipe Book Inspiration Guide, and a High Gloss Finish
product_meta.description: Style Name:8-qt. with DehydratorThe Ninja food I 8 quart, the XL pressure cooker that crisps. With tender crisp technology, you can achieve all the quick cooking and tenderizing wonders that you love about pressure cookers. But where they stop, the food I is just getting started. Its revolutionary crisping lid allows you to air fry, bake, roast, and broil. That means you can pressure cook to lock in juices, then finish with a crisp. Only the Ninja food I gives you the best of pressure cooking and air frying, all in one pot. Transform frozen foods to crispy meals. Create wholesome, multi textured 360 meals by cooking proteins, veggies, and grains all together. Elevate your favorite stew and chili recipes by adding a crispy or bubbly top to make one pot wonders.
feature_bullets: Tender crisp technology allows you to quickly cook ingredients, then the crisping lid gives your meals a crispy, golden finish
Pressure cook up to 70 percent faster versus traditional cooking methods. BPA free
Xl 8 quart ceramic Coated pot is nonstick, PTFE/PFOA free and easy to clean
Xl 5 quart cook and crisp basket can hold up to a 7 lb. Chicken to feed your whole family
Includes: crisping lid, pressure lid, 8 qt. Ceramic Coated pot, 5 quart ceramic Coated cook and crisp basket, stainless steel rack, recipe book

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars13,865 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
